sentences.sContent: He was always asking impertinent questions.
sentences.sCn: 他老是问一些唐突的问题。

sentences.sContent: You are an impertinent young woman.

synos.tran: 不恰当的；无礼的；粗鲁的；不相干的

words.tran: 不切题地；不恰当地；不礼貌地

trans.tranCn: 无关的, 鲁莽的, 不相干的
trans.tranOther: rude and not respectful, especially to someone who is older or more important
